name: FrenchWordoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, ask French Words for my word of the day”
”Alexa, open French Words and get my word of the day”
”Alexa, ask French Words to spell the word of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: french words
des:
A fun and helpful tool to help you learn one the lovely romance languages, French. Whether it's for your holiday you are looking forward to, to impress friends or partner, or just have fun this is the skill for you. Learn new vocabulary every day by receiving a new French word and accompanying English translation to your alexa device.

Simply ask alexa : 'ask french words for my word of the day' , and you will receive a curated French word followed by a translation in English.

The word changes every day at midnight so be sure to check back in so you don't miss out!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
